meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she peined her hair before the party.
meanings.sent2: He peined the fence to make it look neat.
meanings.sent3: The cat peined its fur with meticulous care.
meanings.sent4: The artist peined the canvas with bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: The gardener peined the bushes into intricate shapes.

meanings.sent1: The peined wood had a smooth finish.
meanings.sent2: She admired the peined surface of the table.
meanings.sent3: The peined fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent4: The peined metal gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The peined texture added elegance to the room.
